nodes.text: The Magna-lock safe was a type of safe.

Among the best safes on the market, Magna-lock safes were made out of multiple bonded layers of highest quality durasteel, with special locking mechanisms in the doors. When locked, the safe's door generated micromagnetic fields that created covalent bonds nearly as strong as the surrounding durasteel.
Though magna-lock safes were variable in size, all required highly specialized tools to access by force, and even with these tools, required equally specialized knowledge to open.
